00003 inline double& _dcovector::operator()(const long& i) const
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] _dcovector::operator()(const long&) const"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if( i<0 || L<=i ){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] _dcovector::operator()(const long&) const"
00013               << std::endl
00014               << "The required component is out of the vector size."
00015               << std::endl
00016               << "Your input was (" << i << ")." << std::endl;
00017     exit(1);
00018   }
00019 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00020   
00021   return Array[i];
00022 }

00049 inline void _dcovector::write(const char *filename) const
00050 {
00051 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00052   std::cerr << "# [MARK] _dcovector::write(const char*) const"
00053             << std::endl;
00054 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00055   
00056   std::ofstream s(filename, std::ios::trunc);
00057   
00058   s << "dcovector" << " " << L << std::endl;
00059   for(long i=0; i<L; i++){
00060     s << operator()(i) << std::endl;
00061   }
00062   
00063   s.close();
00064   destroy();
